paper_abstract: We present quantum algorithms for some graph problems: finding a maximal bipartite matching in time O(n root m-logn), finding a maximal non-bipartite matching in time O(n(2)(root m/n+log n) log n), and finding a maximal flow in an integer network in time O(min(n(7/6) root M (.) U-1/3, root nU m) log n), where n is the number of vertices, m is the number of edges, and U <= n(1/4) is an upper bound on the capacity of an edge.
paper_title: Quantum algorithms for matching and network flows
